title: WhatsApp Button Plugin
description: This full stack project is a WordPress Plugin, which was actually born out of a business necessity - my dad saw a whatsapp button on some website and wanted one for his own business' website. I just finished building his website, and was looking for a cool project to improve my coding skills, so this WordPress plugin was born! It now has 4,000+ active installations ðŸš€

title: Coalition Game
description: This was my first React project, and it was inspired by the constant slew of elections Israel has been facing in the last 3 years. Now, looking at the code for this project, I would do many things more efficiently. But it's still pretty cool.

title: Display Specific Products for Elementor
description: This mini-project was how I learned to build Elementor extensions, before I worked at Elementor. It is a WordPress plugin - an Elementor Add-On. I looked for an extension that can do what this does, and couldn't find one. This extensions allows you to display a grid of specific products on your Elementor page.

title: Super Mario Bros. Clone
description: This project was a fun little attempt at 2D game-building. I built a clone of the classic Super Mario Bros. game, using the Phaser game-building framework.

title: Zugiot: Everything is Powers
description: This project was born from long FIFA nights with friends. When wew were more than 4 players, we had to split into pairs, do rotation, change up the pairs. This app did it for us.
